Text:
If you're running into the invisible text bug,
Grab this file http://fuwanovel.org/other/regadd.bat then drop it in your game folder and run it, and the bug will go away.

Sorry my first comment is wrong. 

you need to put your game in this exact directory: Program Files > Kogado > SRTE 

and then run SR.reg
And that *should* solve the problem.
